title: Vietnam Three Month Interbank Rate
description: Vietnam Three Month Interbank Rate increased to 8.08 percent on Tuesday November 8 from 8.06 percent in the previous day. Interbank Rate in Vietnam averaged 6.96 percent from 1998 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 19.77 percent in August of 2008 and a record low of 1.18 percent in November of 2020. The interbank rate is the rate of interest charged on short-term loans made between banks in the local currency. This page provides - Vietnam Interbank Rate- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: The State Bank of Vietnam
